nodes.text: Transport Station 5 was a part of the communication and transport system on the planet Taris before being destroyed in 3956 BBY during the Destruction of Taris. It was constructed around the Promised Land, the original colony site of Taris. Around 3643 BBY, an individual hired by the researcher, Hacken Berge, went to the remains of Transport Station 5 and found holorecordings of the history of the Promised Ones, a group of outcasts who had survived the bombardment of Taris.
